'''''Sotheby's Valuable Autograph Letters, Literary Manuscripts and Historical Documents 12â€“13 December 1977''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (London). It includes several letters by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]:

*Lot 363 (p. 181): [[Letter 122]].
*Lot 364 (p. 181): [[Letter 144]].
*Lot 365 (p. 182): [[Letter 154]]. The final page of the letter is reproduced.
*Lot 366 (p. 182): [[Letter 164]]. 
*Lot 367 (p. 183): [[Letter 176]]. 
*Lot 368 (p. 183): [[Letter 220]].
*Lot 369 (p. 183): [[Letter 220a]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=63390|articlename=Valuable Autograph Letters. 1977|dated=|website=TB|accessed=30 March 2014}}</ref>
